speaker: SICINIUS
text_entry: SCENE V. The same. A street near the gate.

speaker: SICINIUS
text_entry: Enter two Senators with VOLUMNIA, VIRGILIA,  VALERIA,  and c. passing over the stage, followed by Patricians and others

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Behold our patroness, the life of Rome!

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Call all your tribes together, praise the gods,

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: And make triumphant fires; strew flowers before them:

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Unshout the noise that banish'd Marcius,

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Repeal him with the welcome of his mother;

speaker: All
text_entry: A flourish with drums and trumpets. Exeunt
